description: Unique identifier for this status change event record.
Date and time the status change was logged.
User account that executed the status change.
Internal identifier of the affected project.
Snapshot of the project’s external/reference ID at the change time; likely denormalized for history. Confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the project’s descriptive name captured at the change time.
Code representing the resulting status after the change.
Snapshot of the canonical identifier for the resulting status at the change time; confirm with SME.
Human-readable label for the resulting status captured at the change time.
Code representing the prior status before the change.
Snapshot of the canonical identifier for the prior status at the change time; confirm with SME.
Human-readable label for the prior status captured at the change time.
Timestamp when this row was last updated in the database.
Timestamp of the last modification attributed to a user action; field naming suggests user ID, but data appears to be a datetime—confirm with SME.
User account that created this row.
Timestamp when this row was created.
User account that last modified this row.
Timestamp when this row was last modified.
